Blog.post: hello! i jus created this blog thingy coz i need a place to post the pics i been taking. jus check them out yo.

finally managed to sign into hello after suffering yesterday n even resetting my password. loaded a few grad pics. the few one wit me in them. wasnt my grad so not many pics. last yr was a SPAN! ya anyways. laters.
urlLink in uniform. well me urlLink
urlLink oops sorry posted that same pic twice. this is the diff one urlLink
urlLink me smiling sweetly but then my hairs over half me face urlLink
urlLink bad pic urlLink
urlLink us 4 cant pose urlLink
urlLink me n mbr both wit evil red eyes urlLink
urlLink at restaurant for lunch urlLink

jus thought i'd pop in for a bit of a write. today was a cool day. i was all sad yesterday coz mbr was gonna miss sku 2day to pick up his bro. but then he turned up so that was cool. i was real happy. well i did have a feeling he'd be coming since yesterday evening so ya. we're connected. or r we. who knows. anyways, its lurve.

well eesh. its been hectic. thast all i can say for now. gotta go. am uploading pics to yahoo groups. n also emailing. good thing havent got mail from mbr that i gotta reply to. ok. thats not good. shudnt say such. i wanna read summin he's written. n wont see him in sku 2moro. sob sob. sniff sniff. wail.
sorry bout my ranting n slandering of good ole reliable blogger. my last post actually DID get published. yipee! YAY!!!!!!!!! cool. ya.

DAMN! this is the SECOND time i've written a post n clicked publish but it hasnt been published. damn. n its been like nearly 2 hrs since i wrote it. actually 3 hrs considering i had to stop during writing the post coz i was on the phone to ppl for over an hr. so. eesh. stupidass blogger. sorry, no offense. actually. offense intended. im pissed! i mean yo its kept on showing publishing, 0%. then i left it to go watch sshrek n dinner at 8 n when i come back its error. so lemme try to remember wat i wrote. summin bout ahveing asked dad this morning if i can stay after midnite after grad 2moro. n after lots of tking he said yes. n then bought my stuff to wear on wednesday afternoon. cudnt find any good dresses so got girly top n jeans. wat else? i wrote that theres beef around. but then i wrote acutally i was wrong n not much beef. anyways watever. oh ya think i shud get some film for 2moro. shud take some pics. or maybe not. the camera thing wasnt in the original post. then i said i been tryina call lng the whole day. well like then mbr called. then i called npn, then mbr, then nda, then lng. she was jus leaving lsk fot ktw. hmmm... am chatting to mbr on yahoo msger n ya he's feeling im busy n i told him wat im doing. but think will stop this now n concentrate on my lovely mbr. ya. im still pissed wit blogger tho.

wassup! my poor neglected blog. well the thing is i do have a life so cant be dedicating all my time to this thingy. 1st wk of sku doing a2 stuff. pretty cool. vectors in maths is bad news. ya. n i got frees for the first time in my life coz now i dont got french. thats cool. doing decline and fall for lit. other texts r wide sargasso sea, emma, and anthony and cleopatra. sounds interesting. read wide sargasso sea yesterday n its thoroughly depressing. made mbr scream today. was cool. went to buy a dress for grad ball aka prom on wednesday. cudnt find any decent dresses so bought a girly top n jeans. will wear some killer heels. its 2moro. n asked dad this morning bout staying out after midnite n he said ya after lots of asking. n ya today mom locked the keys inside the house so we cudnt get in til dad came home at like 5pm. sad. sat bored to death in the stinky restaurant. damn. tried to call lng dunno how many times today. no one picking up. hmmm... wat else. damn my left contacts going fuzzy again. its got serious issues. checked out pt of the rehearsals for grad ceremony. then went back to common room to mess round wit mbr. pretty good. theres beef in the air. damn. been on the phone for the past over an hr. actually, correction. not much beef in the air i think. must be over exaggerating. well everythings pretty messed up n disorganised for the grad stuff. mad. ya. we'll see.

jus did a lovely post. short n sweet. but now, due to some funky computer glitch, its "being ever dissolved in wan wistlessness". how sad. well ya. was summin like this. *** title: and now im back from outer space. well not exactly from outer space but watever. didnt have internet last nite. was really dead n stuff. weird. got a span to write but wanna read evelyn waugh, decline and fall. jus got it today. also pretty discrouraging that i havent had any profile views since sunday. but its cool. im doing this for ME. so as long as i keep on checking my blog n adding stuff to it. ya. *** well that was an attempt. cant possibly capture the spirit of the original. sigh, my work of art is now forever lost.

yoohoo!!! sixteen whole profile views! thats waaaaaaaaay cool! dead chuffed once again. ahhh... the endles satisfaction this lovely blog so graciously presents to me. wel this shud be my last post of the day. really gotta get ready for 2moro. will b waking up at 6 to leave for lsk b4 7. ya NEVER trust my parents. when they said we're not going today but 2moro, they said we'd be leaving early, like 6. but now moms too lazy to wake up that early. bull. like she's gotta drive. i mean yo she can sleep in the car. argh! ok. i shud relax. hmmm... i wonder who's been looking at my profile. I WANNA KNOW!!! well ya. im gone. how sad. wont post anything the WHOLE of 2moro. n maybe not sunday either if i get back late n am too tired. we'll see. bye bye blog. for a while.

already looked at the 1st 3 primers out of 7. im getting alone fine. check it out. wen i get back from lsk will be chging my blog layout considerably. yeah. well heres my pg: *** this is bold this is italics this is typewriter a line coming up and heres all 3 effects lovely! *** riiiiite. i jus got an error posting coz html tag ainr allowed. oh well. jus deleted it. lets see how it goes. title tag also aint allowed. humph!

jus found a urlLink good site on blogger help. yeah! will soon know how to use html n stuff. pretty cool. maybe i can design my own proper website n all. we'll see. im always all very enthusiatic n into stuff when i first start. but after a few days/wks i get lazy bout it n leave in some lonely corner.

work out how to use the same bullets beside my links as beside the list of previous msgs n archive. but how? tried summin but that jus bulleted the hits counter heading n the bullet was all different n stuff. oh ignorance is frustrating indeed.

im officially extremely chuffed with myself. did some cool updates to my blog jus now. added a footer. a hit counter. and a links bit. always wanted to do that. but didnt know how. dunno nada bout html. but hey i jus messed round with the template n lookie here! i did good. a hearty pat on my own back. but still dunno how to remove that banner ad on top though.

jus spent quite some time deleting the high resolution pics on the yahoo group for the fifofus to free up some space. gotta find out how to upload pics but not the high res version. well. hmmm... im really itching to get my hands on a digital camera.
an ever so endearing quote from the charming rita skeeter.

am pretty bored. i got stuff to do. lots n lots of stuff. but im too lazy. so heres a fun activity i thought of. more like a stupid pathetic useless bit of faecal matter but anyways. am still lisning to hp5. so im gonna make a list of interesting words i hear in the story. ya. thats wat u call desperation. *ousted *abstained *jinx *unnerving *occlumency *prickled *lurches *twinge *fluctutations *culminated *sick of standing staring [a good eg of alliteration] [lol. like i said im a geek] *startling *alarmingly *grimly *clutched *pathetic *irritably *frostiness *queue *shiftily *awkward *pang *shrieking *flushed *steamy well ya. that got old pretty fast. im officially sad. MISSING MBR!!!!!!!!!! :-((

its 5:18 and already getting dark. even this morning, jus b4 6, it was really dark. but this winter isnt as cold as last winter. the coldest time has already passed. apparently. in like end of may early june. which is weird. ominous signs of global warning. eesh i shud watch the day after 2moro. hopefully will leave for lsk at 6am 2moro morning. really gotta reach early. hope the shops at manda hill n arcades r open sunday morning. they shud be. then i can spend saturday morning n afternoon wit mbr only. ya. thats if he gets to stay in lsk. damn. lifes messed up.

i got FOUR whole profile views!!! aint that cool or wat? or shud i be disturbed? jus in case some sickos r planning attack or summin? lol. nah thats jus being paranoid. or is it? n now i sound like the articles in the quibbler.

wie gehts? whoa! its been long since i last did german. that was form 3 yo. years ago. but still remember bits n pieces. hmmm... one of these days i shud do a post in french. but eesh even after having written AS french final exams n all jus wks ago. how sad. anyways ya. im still really pissed bout not going to lsk. will NEVER EVER trust my parents again. i mean WAT THE HELL?! they bloody promise n all n then go, oh, looks like we got work, cant go. FCUK! n ya did that misspelling on purpose. lol. am stil lisning to hp. on ootp now. umbridge jus did a trademark "hem, hem". lol. eesh wonder how long its gonna take bk6 to come out. im getting real desperate to get my grubby lil hands on it. cant wait. oh ya, in continuation wit my deustchness... auf wiedersehen!

well i like my ghost pic. but using it for my profile doesnt seem appropriate. but thats the only pic of relatively reccent jus me i got on my pc so i'll have to make do. will scan a span of other pics 2moro n put up a better me profile pic. yawn... i gotta get to zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz...........................

trying to figure out how to upload my pic to "about me" on my blog pg. it says i shud enter the url n use hello but how?! am checking help... seconds later... HEY! waddaya know! i can do it! yipee!!!!!!!
jus checked my profile n a grand total of TWO ppl have looked at my profile. now aint that grand.
urlLink thats me in grade 5. musta been 9. aw... how cute i look! urlLink

urlLink thats us in all our glory. at entrance of the hotel. damn the person who took the pic doesnt know how to take pics. our feet r cut n check how much space is on top and on the sides. tut tut. but we still look good rite. urlLink
urlLink thats our class. the girl in the badge covered blazer is the german exchange student. but a few ppl didnt show up for the ceremony so that sad. not everyones in the pic urlLink
urlLink our table. i aint in the pic coz think was tking the pic. isnt the deco marvelous? urlLink
urlLink oops wrong pic. THIS is us five. THAT was a mistake. me n lups. dont we look all married n stuff? lol. NOTE: my hairs not all lovely n curly like that. i jus did that for grad. urlLink

urlLink thats us girls, five best friends in f5 morning of 21st. the cameras a bit slow keeping up with the times. all looking old n stuff n the grad gowns n caps. n ya it was our skus silver jubilee yr so we got the silver badges. this is in our skus lower primary playground. the white building on the right is nursery. urlLink

urlLink thats MMMMMMEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!! dont i look all ghostlike? pretty cool huh? well thats on grad nite last yr 21st june my form 5 grad. really good fun. i wasnt supposed to be in the pic but some how got caught at the edge. urlLink

jus went crazy n posted 29 pics. ya i do tend to go overboard. apologies if blog takes long time to load all the pics or if its becoming a photoblog. but wat the hell? y am i saying sowwy when im the only person looking at it anyways. its MY blog n i can post a million pics on it if i want. its MINE. all MINE! muah ha ha ha ha ha ha [evil laugh]

am feeling positively positive. well that a pretty bad thing bout me. if sumin bad happens i tend to block it out of my head instead of dealing with it. oh well. jus checked out all my lovely posted pics but found a problem i jus HAD to bitch bout. wat the hell? i posted the "this is the last" pic AFTER the one which appears on the website to have been posted after it. how messed up.
urlLink or is it blue birds fly urlLink

urlLink last victoria falls one! u may have noticed the ugly bits of black. well some of us africans arent advanced enough to possess digital camera. had to scan them. takes really long. but like i said i hope to get a digicam soon. urlLink

urlLink whoa i think im totally into photo blogging now. its dead addictive. now isnt this a beautiful sight. the vic falls in livingstone. lovely. my dear cousing took these when he went last yr. he's back in china now. getting married in october. i only been to livingstone once in my soon to be TEN YEARS in zed. urlLink
urlLink and n.e.r.d. pharrells hot. n chads looking not bad either. n no idea wat the other guys name is. thought n.e.r.d. only had 2 members. ah ignorance... urlLink

urlLink sigh, isnt he hot. well i USED to be totally obsessed with ryan phillippe bout over a yr ago. now i jus think he's pretty hot. damn i hope im not infringing any copyrights or anything. dont wanna get sued n stuff. urlLink
urlLink finally... wat i been waiting for! urlLink

i guess i was being paranoid bout that whole conspiracy theory thingy. ny blog actually turned up on the most recetly posted list jus now. its good. i feel much better now. ya thats very sad of me, being uplifted by some bloggy thingy but hey lemme feel better in peace. ya. will use hello to upload the pic for solid evidence. oh ya maybe this blogs gonna show up on search engines n stuff now. lets try.

ARGH!!!!!!!!!!!! is swearing allowed on this blog thing? coz i effing need to madly. NOT going to lsk 2moro. going saturday. am severely pissed. will scream. AAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!! really wanted to see mbr n stuff. bloody hell. i mean yo poor boy went today n we'll MAYBE meet if he gets to stay til sunday. need to slam some doors n break stuff.

well since the finals finished (for me, some lucky buggers only had 2 wks of exams while i had FOUR) a wk ago i been chillin n doing nuttin since, as is customary with me. ya well today was lovely. jus chilled in my room lisning to hp n reading all the essays in the index list of hpl well not like all in detail but ya i skim thru. checked out some templates on blogskins.com or summin like that cant really b sure bout the name of the site n eesh too lazy to bother to use any of them. will jus stay with this cool green dotty one. well since my fav colour is pink n stuff i wanted a pink one wat the hell. lethargy prevails. and WHOA! i jus went to that crush007 site quiz issue n damn. i feel really stupid. but hey no harm done. will be sending to all my friends n enemies. oh wait, i dont have any enemies but thats cool im im surely gonna have a span after i trick everyone. boy it feels good to do evil deeds. anyways ya. i smell dinner. yummy. dads cooking coz moms jus got home n is tired n stuff. ya. whoa also asked dad bout lsk 2moro n he's saying gotta confirm wit mom. wat the hell?! first it was last saturday. then early this wk. then thursday. then friday definitely. n now we'll see. ARGH! oh breathe. ya. and my stupid freaking cd writer sux!!!

WHOA! i cant believe someone actually commented on my blog. really really surprising. felt like falling off my chair or summin. but eesh. thats really cool. im dead chuffed. very very very chuffed. thanks mike! u made my day. still cant get over it. woo hoo! ok but im really getting excited. but like whoa now wat r the chances of getting another comment? very slim i'd say. but still. im letting myself jus indulge in happiness for now.
well my blog didnt make it on the recently updated list. how sad. im trying again. maybe ur own blog doesnt show up or summin. or maybe its a conspiracy against me. aha! lol. i've gone mad.
trying to get my blog to show up on the recently updated list. lets see if this works

wat the hell. how cud i think theres only 10 students in the whole of blogger. like DUH! it was jus showing the first ten. there was continue at the bottom of the pg. now thats WAY more like it. phew!

was jus checking out my profile n whoa! it doesnt even show all the bks i put n stuff. wat the hell. oh well. n ya found 5 ppl from zambia n 10 students. 5 from zed i can understand. but only 10 students? whoa. anyways ya. probably only geeky ppl like me. nah. i dunno. wateva. ya. well im jus chilling by the pc lisning to hp coz tv sucks totally nowadays n i wanna read emma but i gotta finish lisning first. also checking out essays on hp lexicon. ya im really obsessed. hmmm... gotta start checking out unis man. only less than 6 months to go. gotta start studying for sats n stuff. damn. im so behind. will start next wk when sku starts. for now enjoy n chill to recover from the horrible stress of the exams. ya. and hey i wonder when someones gonna look at my profile. guess i'll jus have to keep on doing this for a long time or summin. dunno. i checked like the other students all got like over 1000 posts n im like whoa. but ya probably a span of bloggers arent bothered bout filling in their profile or summin.

now i think this is wat i had forgotten, not the xiaoyi stuff in the last post but of course i had forgotten that as well. was jus wondering when if ever im gonna get a comment on my blog. i'd be really chuffed if u do get a comment tho, even if its insulting me or wateva. at least i'd know that im not the othly person who's seen my blog. of course i cud give the addy to some friends but nah thats a bit hmmm... dunno if i'll want them to read all this stuff. well it wudnt matter coz i mean anyone can find this thingy but it would be pretty embarrassingas i've already said. ya.

well nah i remembered 15mins ago or summin like that. but then i added all those details to my profile n stuff. ya well back to wat i remembered. jus that since now i've put xiaoyi into the body of my posts maybe google will show up summin. fingers crossed.

hey how some i searched google for "the wonderful world of summin" and no results came up. nothing for xiaoyi87 either. is it coz my blog is a standalone thingy with no links to it or summin? or is it too new or summin. how weird. will be searching google regularly to check up. oh ya. shud also use other search engines. oh ya n this is SO not cool. xiaoyi is always taken up as a username. even for like hotmail n yahoo n stuff. really frustrating having to append numbers n i really dont like adding numbers to stuff but what else am i supposed to do? i love my name. hey now i wonder wat its gonna take me to get a gmail account. maybe like active users r defined as having loads of interaction wit other bloggers n not jus posting a span of stuff. but even if thats the case n i dont get gmail coz i certainly dont have enough time to network wit other users n probably theyre not at all interested in my blog i guess its ok coz writing here is pretty cool. eesh that was a confusing sentence. really good if i can build a huge collection of posts n compile a book or summin. of course no chance of it getting published but jus summin cool. a family heirloom or summin. lol. could be worth a few bucks a thousand yrs form now. u never know. anyways so my original purpose for this blog was to get a gmail account. but this seems now highly unlikely but its cool. yahoo mail got 100mb. but still. its cool to have @gmail.com. well guess i'll jus have to wait for it to become available to the public. but really hope my names not taken. that wouldnt be cool. us africans r always at a disadvantage. now i wanted to say summin else but i forgot. typical.

i mean yo i chose this tmeplate coz it looks good but it doesnt have any space for links. but i wanna put in some links. HELP!!! anyways now im bout the go off topic but hey who cares this is MY world n i can do wateva i want. ahhh..... a nice boost for the ego. really hope i get to watch hp3 2moro at arcades. really really really need to watch it. and then probably when it comes at metro 2 i'll watch it like 3 or 4 more times. and eesh now im wondering if i shud b tking bout other ppl in this blog thingy. i mean isnt that bad for their privacy? maybe i shud make up some codenames or summin like that. ya. good idea. well not really. eesh man if im gonna be writing in this thing, writing longass emails to 2 ppl, what the hell am i suppsoed to write in my diary? havent touched that thing properly for a LONG time. wrote like a sentence on 14th. that took lots of effort. fell asleep n then when tz called i forced myself to scribble summin b4 the 15th dawned. now i really gotta give this blog some kinda direction. like a cause to get really passionate about. but what?! coz not exactly like i can use this to record watevers happening in my life. oh ya. will definitely get a digital camera when i go back to china in july/august winter holidays so i can go crazy snapping everything n uploading stuff herre n also on the fff group. ya. but meanwhile i really gotta find a good cause to dedicate this blog to. will get thinking. well not really. im really lazy. so probably i'll continue going on bout nuttin in particular nutil some idea decides to stumble into my mind. now this is the longest post i've done os far. very chuffed with myself. but yo. i really gotta stat doing some paragraphing n stuff. ya.

i wanted to post everyday on this issue but didnt yesterday. am too lazy. really bad. well will be going to lsk tomorrow. hopefully. lol. i wonder if anyones reading this. now wont it be real embarrassing if someone i know actually stumbles into herre n read all my uselessass rumblings. oh well. the things we do for the sake of geekdom.

going out for dinner soon at arabian nights. ya. pretty boring actually. n was supposed to go to lsk on thursday but now tonys only back like on sunday so we're going saturday but thats really crap so will try real hard to make sure we go thursday as originally planned.
oh ya, its my birthday today! YEAH!!!!! but actually im not very excited but its still pretty cool.
whoa well i jus wanted to do this coz i really wanna get a gmail account n stuff. ya.

ni hao peeps! this b pretty cool. ya ya ya. i know i been a bad girl n all neglecting my poor lonely blog but hey. im a global jetsetter. ok fine so i jus go from zed to c but its all good. ya so i jus thought i shud say a quick hiya. gosta go now. was supposed to leave this city this morning but moms renewed her ticket n stay so ya i'll be here for another week. actually more than a wk. perfect for doing more shopping. this is ok.

whoa now i wonder if that french is ok. was lisning to french radio this afternoon. except it was english first. a programme bout how muslim chinese girls r sold into marriage to pay for their bros education. very sad. but theyre getting help so. in ninxia province or summin like that. well the good news is im flying for china on 19th. next monday. the bad news is mbrs parents want him to go back to india. but im like totally not accepting that. cant even bring myself to imagine life without him. so i refuse to go there. he's gonna stay. no other option.

hiya looks like i've already lost la plupart de my decication to my lovely blog. how very sad. its jus like me. i really gotta chg. well no sku today or yesterday coz its heroes n unity days. so pretty cool. aint touched no sku work at home. but gotta get my hands dirrty now. got a phy test to study for n a bloody lit essay. commentary on the sports n the sports - continued. two whole bloody chapters. very bad. sigh. at least tked to mbr for like 30mins this morning first thing. n now he's online so yeah. been chatting for a while. ooooo......... think i'll watch chocolat at 11:55 so thats cool. hope its a good movie.
